name: halal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food, places where food is sold, etc.) correct according to Islamic law, for example following rules relating to the way animals are killed for meat : halal meat a halal butcher We buy the ingredients from a halal shop. All our chicken is strictly halal.
(of an activity, a business, etc.) allowed and correct according to Islamic law: Muslims can request that their employers invest their pension funds in halal businesses. Is it halal to donate blood? Opposite
haramCompare
kosher
More examplesFewer examplesAt the end of the workshop the speakers shared kosher and halal sweets with all students as a symbol of friendship.She wants beef and chicken that are healthy as well as halal (slaughtered and blessed according to Islamic law).Spectators supporting India and Pakistan were made welcome with prayer tents and stalls selling halaal and vegetarian food.They offer halal car insurance to British Muslims.The main business of the company whose shares are to be traded in should be halaal. He said that money earned from selling cigarettes was not halaal money.
